page.title: 10ODCOMBE TIP
page.content: {Odcombe tip}is used for refuse disposal for the{Yeovil area,}serviced by dust carts and members of the public .A man has a contract with the local council which allows him to extract any scrap metal or newspapers, cardboard etc which can be sold by him. The site is on an area of{natural {springs}and the water is drained off and sprayed onto the nearby fields.The field adjacent was previously the tip, but has been filled in and now grows a crop of maize every year for silage, and cattle are kept on the stubble during the winter.{ Opening times are as follows: Monday - Thursday 8.15 - 4.15 Friday 9.15 - 4.15 Saturday only by appointment Sunday closed
